name: Dark Elf (itch) (Neeka of OBP)
description:
A character sprite perfect for visual novels. 

5 Expressions include: Neutral, Happy, Sad, Angry, and Blush.

You can use in free + commercial projects.  You may edit the material slightly (no redrawing pieces/full art) but you may not redistribute the modifications made. 

Note: MUST credit the artist Remnantation. 

The file is a PSD so make sure you have software that can open/edit! (GIMP is free)
